Subject: RE: financial documents (Epstein)

I think you had said you wanted to talk about the scope of the financial investigation, but I don't have a view on this. 
Happy to schedule it as a call. 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, July 23, 2019 10:45 AM 
To: 
) 
Subject: RE: financial documents (Epstein) 
Is there an agenda for this? If so, I have no problem meeting in person, but if we just expect it to be like 10 minutes of 
introducing ourselves then I'd personally vote phone call. 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, July 23, 2019 10:45 
To: 
Subject: RE: financial documents (Epstein) 
Same here, thanks. Would you guys prefer in person or by phone? I have no preference.

On Jul 18, 2019, at 11:17

) [Contractor] 
From: ). 
Sent: Wednesday, July 17, 2019 8:47 PM

Subject: RE: financial documents (Epstein)

Andy, 
Tomorrow morning could you please burn the following folders to a  disc: 
Wsa.doj.gov\ cloud\ NYS\ StAndrewAShareaUSvEpstein-2018801618 InvestigationVt 2018 SDNY 
investigation \Subpoena Returns\American Express

the envelope with security and reply all that it's ready, they can pick up when convenient. 
thanks, 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00021369
